verbose_text: Furthermore, we expressed and purified recombinant GST (glutathione S-transferase)-H1.2, GST-H1.4, and His pRb 1-379 and performed in vitro GST and Ni-NTA binding assays, where His pRb bound efficiently to GST-H1.2 or GST-H1.4, but not to GST alone (XREF_FIG E and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY F), suggesting a specific and direct interaction between pRb and histone H1 subtypes H1.2 and H1.4.
evidence: interaction between pRb and histone H1 subtypes H1.2 and H1.4
